mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
Fate Grand Order Saint Quartz Acquisition:
- Saint Quartz is the a currency used for summoning servants. It is a rare resource that is given scarcely to F2P players.
- It can be obtained in various ways: By logging in on consecutive days, cumulative login days, completing weekly missions, progressing with the main quest or as compensation for server downtime.
- It can also be purchased in one of 6 different bundles
- When summoning using saint quartz, the player can either receive a servant or craft essence. In this diagram we will only track the servants and their respective star level, therefore the pulls that would have resulted in craft essences will be wasted.
mxTextCell.prevLabel:
Fate Grand Order Saint Quartz Acquisition:
- Saint Quartz is the a currency used for summoning servants. It is a rare resource that is given scarcely to F2P players.
- It can be obtained in various ways: By logging in on consecutive days, cumulative login days, completing weekly missions, progressing with the main quest or as compensation for server downtime.
- It can also be purchased in one of 6 different bundles
- When summoning using saint quartz, the player can either receive a servant or craft essence. In this diagram we will only track the servants and their respective star level, therefore the pulls that would have resulted in craft essences will be wasted.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: You can adjust the chance of a daily purchase by modifying the value in this register
mxTextCell.prevLabel: You can adjust the chance of a daily purchase by modifying the value in this register

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: You can also control which bundle you want to be purchased by adjusting the chances on the state connections leaving the gate (they always normalize towards 100%)
mxTextCell.prevLabel: You can also control which bundle you want to be purchased by adjusting the chances on the state connections leaving the gate (they always normalize towards 100%)
